item.title: Turn Robert's Beard Purple!
item.description: TL;DR If I raise $100 by August 25ths The Walk to End Alzheimer’s, I will have my beard dyed purple in support of Alzheimer’s awareness. If you are in another country, donate to your local Alzheimer’s charity and email me with the subject walk so I count it towards my total. Links: My donation page (Charity report on Alzheimer’s Association) Facebook Fundraising Page (if you want to share it!
